original: 恭喜您完成首周目的成功結局。您可以開始進行「征戰新史+」，使用解鎖的新功能。舊有的進度存檔，將保持原有功能與設定，不會更新或覆蓋。若要查看周目解鎖項目，請點選「周目說明」。
text: Congratulations on the successful ending of the first week of objectives. You can start 'Conquering New History+' and use the unlocked new features. The old progress archive will keep the original functions and settings and will not be updated or overwritten. To view the unlocked items of the weekly item, please click 'Description of the weekly item'.
